ctrl

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x0
Size:
0x4
Source:
output.rdl

Description

contains the control parameters of the clock device

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:16] prescaler rw 0x1 -
[15:1] - - - -
[0] enable rw 0x0 -

Field Descriptions

prescaler

prescaler factor

enable

set this field to '1' to start the clock
